extendedInfo.description: GERBLINS! GERBLINS EVERYWHERE! The Gerblin disease is spreading, and only you, with your powerful brain, can uncover which Blergs are infected! Root out Gerblins from amongst the Blergs, and cure them with the Gerblin potion! But be careful... One misstep will bring on EVEN MORE Blergs and Gerblins. And as Professor Blerg's grandpappy used to say, "More Gerblins, more perblems." Seamlessly blending influences from older classics, Gerblins is a highly addictive logic game with six different game types, each featuring 30 levels of ludicrously escalating difficulty. If you have a brain and you like to use it, you'll LOVE Gerblins! In this free version of Gerblins, you'll have access to one of the six game types which are available in the full version.

reviews.title: Nicely presented; easy to play!...

reviews.title: Straightforward and adorable
reviews.comment: It\'s a spin off of minesweeper but it will have you shouting \"OHMERGERD, GERBLINS!!!\"
reviews.author: Ian Norton

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Minesweeper, but without the annoyance of an unlucky click ending the whole game. Great idea and cute graphics. Very addictive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good time waster
reviews.comment: I think claiming this game is a mine sweeper clone is a bit unfair. Yes, there are big similarities, but simply with the fact that the blocks shift and new ones can be added makes the gameplay fundamentally different. There is a lot more pure chance in this one, but it is made up for by the fact that a mistake does not mean instant death. Overall this game is great fun!
reviews.author: Bjorn Worpel

reviews.title: great !
reviews.comment: I liked to play it ! broke 34, but no more. it would be better I can play from a certain level not from level 1.

reviews.title: Fun entertainment
reviews.comment: This game is a neat little idea I\'ve always wondered about and now it\'s come to life. I also like how it doesn\'t require everything on your phone too operate. I believe if you like puzzles you should pick up Gerblins!
